edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.core.scene.tangible
Interface ISegment

All Superinterfaces:
INeuronMorphologyPart, ISelectable
All Known Implementing Classes:
MorphMLSegmentImpl
public interface ISegment
extends INeuronMorphologyPart

Defines the smallest unit of an INeuronMorphology. A segment has a proximal and a distal point, and each has a radius.

Author:
Stephen D. Larson (slarson@ncmir.ucsd.edu)
